comments: Consultant hited to provide ngineering services for the Pleasant Camp Port of Entry groundwater treatment project as the fluoride concentration has exceeded the Canadian Drinking Water Quality Guide requirement. Scope of work includes: prepare a design brief report, complete system components sizing and complete water treatment plant detailed design with specifications and drawings including detailed process, electrical and control. The consultant will also provide techincal support and engineering services during the construction and commissioning stage including shop drawings reviews and construction inspections.
